OboeFutureRegMap
interface
OboeFutureRegMap
Method
lookup
method Tuple2#(
Bool,
Tag
) lookup(ArchRegId index)

Lookup the tag for physical register file in future register map.

Parameter
index

Architectural register index to look up in future register map.

Returns

Tuple2 for Bool and Tag. The Bool value indicates the outdated status of the entry.

rename
method Action rename(
ArchRegId 
rd,
Tag 
tag
)

Rename the future register map entry with the given tag.

Parameter
rd
ArchRegId

The ID of the destination register to be renamed

tag
Tag

Tag to rename.

Subinterface
wbPorts

A Vector of Put interface for write back request from execution units. EXU puts the ArchRegId rd in the put method to indicate the corresponding instruction finishes execution.

Method
restore
method Action restore(
Vector #(
NumArchRegs, Reg#(Tag)) 
arm
)

Update all the entries in future register map with entries in architectural register map.

Parameter
arm
Vector(NumArchRegs, Reg#(Tag))

The whole architectural register map vector.

mkOboeFutureRegMap
module mkOboeFutureRegMap(
OboeFutureRegMap
)

The future register map is in charge of maintaining the renamed tags. The module contains two vectors: tag_vector and outdated_vector. The combination of the two is the future register map.

Functions
genWbPort
function Put#(
ArchRegId
) genWbPort(Integer i)

Function to generate a Put interface with index i.

Parameter
i

Port index.

Return

The Put interface at index i.
